actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend Chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to make permanent the special pay provisions for reenlistment and enlistment bonuses, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes permanent specified provisions of Federal law providing for the payment of enlistment, reenlistment, or extension of enlistment bonuses to members of the uniformed services who qualify in a critical military skill. Increases the maximum amounts of such bonuses. Extends to not more than 14 years the maximum period a member may serve and still remain eligible for the reenlistment or extension of enlistment bonus. Repeals the requirement that a person must enlist for four years to be eligible for the enlistment bonus.

titles.title: A bill to amend Chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to make permanent the special pay provisions for reenlistment and enlistment bonuses, and for other purposes.
